Verify the 'Update Password' button is disabled, has background color #e9ecef, text 'Update Password', and padding 10px 15px

Verify the 'Shipping Address' section heading has font weight 600, color #333333, and top padding 25px
Load the home page 'https://example.com/'
Verify the top navigation bar has background color #f8f9fa, height 60px, border bottom 1px solid #e0e0e0, remains fixed at top (top 0px) when page is scrolled, and has opacity 1
Verify the 'Home' link has text 'Home', font size 17px, font weight 500, and left padding 15px, right padding 15px
Verify the 'Home' link has color #007bff when active

Display the 'Password Reset' success notification
